comments.body: Agh, `helpText` is embedded inside a paragraph element, which produces an error because divs cannot be embedded within paragraphs. I will fix this.

Micronit: Could we say "run" instead of "experiment runs" here & elsewhere? I think having the word "experiment" before "run" doesn't add too much clarity / might confuse people about whether an experiment or run is being deleted/restored, lmk what you think.
Just following the designs here! Let's make the change later if we have consensus.
